query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Rooster Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Confidence and Integrity - The Sacred Guardian of the Rooster',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Rooster symbolizes confidence, punctuality, and unwavering integrity. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Rooster represents vigilance, honesty, and the courage to speak truth. Those born under this sign possess natural leadership abilities and a strong sense of responsibility to their community.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Rooster (1957, 1969, 1981, 1993, 2005, 2017, 2029)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Rooster''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510010;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Dog Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Loyalty and Protection - The Sacred Guardian of the Dog',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Dog symbolizes loyalty, protection, and unconditional devotion. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Dog embodies the highest virtues of friendship, loyalty, and selfless service. Those born in the Year of the Dog are blessed with a noble heart and the ability to inspire trust in all who know them.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Dog (1958, 1970, 1982, 1994, 2006, 2018, 2030)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Dog''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510011;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Pig Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Abundance and Generosity - The Sacred Guardian of the Pig',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Pig symbolizes abundance, generosity, and joyful prosperity. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Pig represents wealth, good fortune, and the ability to enjoy life''s pleasures with gratitude. Those born under this sign possess a generous spirit and the gift of attracting abundance in all forms.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Pig (1959, 1971, 1983, 1995, 2007, 2019, 2031)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Pig''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510012;
